verses.kjv: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. They are corrupt, they have done abominable works, there is none that doeth good.
verses.ct: Fools tell themselves, "There is no God." They are morally ruined, and their actions are disgusting. Not a single one of them does what is right.

verses.kjv: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
verses.ct: The LORD gazed down from heaven on the human race to see if anyone truly understood and was searching for God.

verses.kjv: They are all gone aside, they are all together become filthy: there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
verses.ct: Every one of them has turned away; together they have become worthless. Not a single person does what is right â€” not even one.

verses.kjv: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread, and call not upon the LORD.
verses.ct: Will those who practice evil never learn? They devour my people the way someone devours bread, and they never call on the LORD.

verses.kjv: There were they in great fear: for God is in the generation of the righteous.
verses.ct: But then they were overwhelmed with dread, because God stands with the generation of those who live rightly.

verses.kjv: Ye have shamed the counsel of the poor, because the LORD is his refuge.
verses.ct: You mock the plans of the oppressed, but the LORD is their shelter.

verses.kjv: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! when the LORD bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
verses.ct: If only salvation for Israel would come from Zion! When the LORD restores the fortunes of his people, Jacob will celebrate and Israel will be filled with joy.
